metadata.author: William Boericke
metadata.title: Boericke's Pocket Manual of Materia Medica with Repertory
metadata.description: Practical clinical materia medica with therapeutic indications and proven remedies
metadata.philosophy: Clinical application focus with practical therapeutic indications

Aconitum Napellus.preparation: Tincture of whole plant when beginning to flower
Aconitum Napellus.therapeuticIndication: First remedy in acute inflammatory conditions with sudden onset
keynotes: Great fear, anxiety, and worry accompany every ailment
High fever with dry heat and thirst

mindAndHead.description: Great fear, anxiety, and worry accompany every ailment. Delirium with unhappiness, worry, fear. Forehead feels hot, band-like sensation.

fever.description: High fever with full, hard, tense pulse. Skin dry and hot. Patient restless and anxious.
symptoms: Thirst for large quantities of cold water
Sweat relieves all symptoms except weakness

respiratory.description: Useful in the early stages of croup and pneumonia

Aconitum Napellus.dosage: First to third potency in repeated doses. For anxiety states, higher potencies.

Belladonna.preparation: Tincture of whole fresh plant when beginning to flower
Belladonna.therapeuticIndication: Violent acute conditions with heat, redness, throbbing, and burning

mindAndHead.description: Violent delirium, sees monsters and hideous faces. Intense throbbing headache worse light and noise.
symptoms: Head hot, face red and flushed

fever.description: High fever with hot, red skin but no thirst. Burning heat with delirium.
symptoms: Sleep interrupted by starting and delirium

throat.description: Throat dry, feels constricted. Difficult swallowing, especially liquids.

Belladonna.dosage: First to thirtieth potency. For inflammation, lower potencies repeated frequently.

Bryonia Alba.preparation: Tincture of fresh root before flowering
Bryonia Alba.therapeuticIndication: Mucous membranes dry. Excessive thirst. Aggravation from motion

mindAndHead.description: Irritable, wants to be quiet. Talks of business. Bursting, splitting headache.

respiratory.description: Dry, hacking cough worse on entering warm room. Expectoration rust-colored.

digestive.description: Intense thirst for large quantities at long intervals. Constipation.

Bryonia Alba.dosage: Third to thirtieth potency. For acute conditions, frequent repetition.
Bryonia Alba.duration: Deep acting, effects may last weeks

Arsenicum Album.therapeuticIndication: Burning pains relieved by heat. Great restlessness and prostration

mindAndHead.description: Great anguish and restlessness. Fear of death. Despair of recovery.

digestive.description: Burning pains in stomach. Vomiting and diarrhea after eating or drinking.
symptoms: Cannot bear sight or smell of food

respiratory.description: Asthma worse midnight. Cannot lie down, fears suffocation.

skin.description: Dry, rough, scaly skin. Burning like fire, better heat.

Arsenicum Album.dosage: Third to thirtieth potency. Thirtieth and higher for chronic cases.
Arsenicum Album.duration: Deep acting, effects may persist for months

therapeuticTips.acuteIllness: Start with Aconitum for sudden onset, Belladonna for inflammation with heat
therapeuticTips.chronicDisease: Consider constitutional remedies like Arsenicum, Lycopodium, Sulphur
therapeuticTips.prescriptionGuidance: Match the totality of symptoms, not just the disease name
therapeuticTips.potencySelection: Lower potencies (6C-30C) for acute, higher (200C-1M) for chronic and mental symptoms
